item.title: 简街希望六周内对印度做出回应，但时间可能更短
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，简街集团有限责任公司（Jane Street Group LLC）已向印度证券监管机构申请再延长六周时间，以准备针对市场操纵指控的辩护，但可能获得的时间会更短。【原文：Jane Street Group LLC has sought six more weeks from India’s securities regulator to prepare its defense against market manipulation allegations, though it may get fewer, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 俄罗斯围绕克里姆林宫钦点的超级应用程序构建新网络
item.description:
政府正在协调努力，打击外国技术服务，并建立由政府控制的国内选择。【原文：

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯和穆罕默德-苏丹广播公司远未摆脱对石油的依赖
item.description: 大约十年前，沙特阿拉伯现任王储穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼（Mohammed bin Salman）曾表示，到 2020 年，沙特阿拉伯王国的经济将能够在没有石油的情况下生存，他将这一说法与旨在引导国家进入新时代的巨额投资联系在一起。如今，关键指标显示，沙特政府对石油美元的依赖程度依然如故，甚至有过之而无不及。【原文：Around a decade ago, Saudi Arabia’s now Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman said the kingdom’s economy would be able to survive without oil by 2020, a claim he linked to huge investments aimed at steering the country into a new era. Today, key indicators show the government remains just as reliant on petrodollars, if not more so.】

item.title: 特斯拉与 LG Energy 签订价值 43 亿美元的电池供应合同
item.description: 一位熟知内情的人士透露，特斯拉公司已经签署了一项价值 43 亿美元的协议，从 LG Energy Solution Ltd. 公司采购磷酸铁锂电池，这是这家电动汽车制造商本月在韩国的第二次合作。【原文：Tesla Inc. has signed a $4.3 billion agreement to source lithium iron phosphate, or LFP, batteries from LG Energy Solution Ltd., a person familiar with the matter said, in the second tie-up for the EV maker in South Korea this month.】

item.title: 据称信实将在 Jio IPO 中寻求小规模浮动，筹资 60 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）正在提议出售其 Jio 电信部门仅 5%的股份，这次潜在的上市可能会融资 60 多亿美元。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd. is proposing to sell just 5% of its Jio telecommunications unit in a potential listing that may raise more than $6 billion, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 特朗普利用贸易威胁在中国后院充当和事佬
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对泰国和柬埔寨发出关税威胁，促使两国本周结束了致命的边境冲突，再次表明他愿意利用贸易战这把大棒来阻止武装冲突，并在中国的后院给中国一记重拳。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariff threats against Thailand and Cambodia pushed them toward ending their deadly border clash this week, showing again his willingness to use a trade war cudgel to stop armed conflict and upstaging China in its own backyard.】

item.title: 分析师称特朗普的 "餐巾纸 "贸易协议令东南亚担忧
item.description: 一位重要的政策观察家表示，由于迄今达成的协议缺乏确定的细节或承诺，各国和企业需要继续做好准备，应对下月贸易协议截止日期之后美国关税带来的挑战性影响。【原文：Nations and businesses need to remain prepared for challenging impacts from US tariffs after next month’s deadline for trade deals, as agreements struck so far are short on firm details or commitments, according to a key policy watcher.】

item.title: 美元走软，美国关税迫在眉睫，铜价走高
item.description: 随着美元走软以及美国对工业金属征收关税的最后期限临近，铜价走高。【原文：Copper edged higher as the dollar weakened and a deadline for a US tariff on the industrial metal loomed.】

item.title: 菲律宾通过新举措实现 17 亿美元退休基金目标
item.description: 据一位官员透露，菲律宾央行预计将有约1000亿比索（约合17亿美元）的资金投入到一项自愿退休投资计划中，该计划将有助于推动国内资本市场的发展。【原文：The Philippine central bank sees around 100 billion pesos ($1.7 billion) being poured into a voluntary retirement investment program that could help boost the domestic capital market, according to an official.】

item.title: SBI 引领 92 亿美元的印度快速股票销售浪潮
item.description: 印度国家银行（State Bank of India）最近创纪录地发行股票，引领了夏季快速股票销售的热潮，因为本地公司利用今年股市上涨的机会筹集资金。【原文：State Bank of India’s recent record offering is leading a summer onslaught of a fast-tracked type of share sale as local companies take advantage of this year’s stock-market rally to raise funds.】

item.title: 尽管芯片业务不景气，三星的特斯拉大订单仍为复苏注入动力
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.）与特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Samsung Electronics Co.’s surprise $16.5 billion chipmaking deal with Tesla Inc. has breathed new life into a foundry business all but written off by many investors.】

item.title: 澳大利亚通胀降温，为澳大利亚央行降息提供支撑
item.description: 截至 6 月份的三个月中，澳大利亚的核心通胀率有所下降，从而加强了储备银行最早在 8 月份放松货币政策的理由，因为有迹象表明价格压力正在减弱。【原文：Australia’s core inflation cooled in the three months through June, strengthening the case for the Reserve Bank to ease monetary policy as early as August on signs of abating price pressures.】

item.title: 报道称美国希望韩元在谈判中升值，韩元随之上涨
item.description: 在当地媒体报道美国在两国贸易谈判期间要求韩元升值后，韩元的表现优于亚洲同行。【原文：The South Korean won outperformed its Asian peers after local media reported the US demanded appreciation of the currency during trade talks between the two countries.】

item.title: 中国投资者将黄金换成股票，ETF 资金流出创历史新高
item.description: 中国的投资者似乎正从黄金支持的交易所交易基金转向本地股票，随着股市走高和金银价格停滞不前，本月的资金流出量有望创下历史新高。【原文：Investors in China look to be pivoting from gold-backed exchange-traded funds into local equities, putting outflows on course for a record this month as shares push higher and bullion prices stall.】

item.title: 政治风险加剧，交易员将面临更多日元损失
item.description: 在过去三个月中，日元的表现逊于所有主要同类货币，随着政治风险的增加，日元可能面临进一步下跌的风险。【原文：The Japanese yen has underperformed all its major peers in the past three months, and it may be at risk of further declines as political risks mount.】

item.title: 中国债券交易员被股票牛市击倒
item.description: 中国主权债券正面临压力，因为对本地股票日益增长的乐观情绪使两个市场之间的相关性达到了自大流行病以来最极端的水平。【原文：Chinese sovereign bonds are coming under pressure as growing optimism over local stocks drives the correlation between the two markets toward the most extreme levels since the pandemic.】

item.title: 投资者为美联储政策会议做好准备，黄金保持涨势
item.description: 在美联储周三晚些时候做出利率决定之前，黄金保持小幅上涨，美联储官员将就货币政策前景提供重要线索。【原文：Gold held a small advance ahead of the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate decision later Wednesday, with officials set to provide crucial clues on the monetary policy outlook.】

item.description: 当代安培信息科技有限公司（Amperex Technology Co.在香港上市的安培瑞斯科技有限公司（Amperex Technology Co.【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd.’s Hong Kong-listed shares have become a favored short target amid the stock’s rally, even as borrowing costs jump.】

item.title: 富士达股价暴跌，原因是 EQT 计划折价要约收购
item.description: 在瑞典投资公司 EQT 表示将以最新收盘价的折扣价对这家日本电梯制造商发起要约收购后，富士达股份有限公司的股价暴跌达 9.7%，创下七年多来的最大跌幅。【原文：Fujitec Co.’s shares plunged as much as 9.7%, the most in more than seven years, after Swedish investment firm EQT said it would launch a tender offer for the Japanese elevator maker at a discount to its most recent closing price.】

item.title: 对冲基金资金流入，花旗集团为亚洲利率和黄金团队招兵买马
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）地区市场主管表示，该公司计划明年将亚洲利率和黄金业务的员工人数增加 5%-10%，以应对对冲基金等客户的蓬勃需求。【原文：Citigroup Inc. plans to increase headcount in its Asia rates and prime businesses by 5%–10% over the next year to cope with booming demand from customers including hedge funds, according to the bank’s regional markets chief.】

item.title: 新加坡因关税不确定性而保持货币政策稳定
item.description: 在连续两轮宽松政策之后，新加坡周三维持货币政策不变，因为通胀低迷使决策者有时间评估今明两年美国关税对经济造成的影响。【原文：Singapore left its monetary policy unchanged Wednesday after two consecutive rounds of easing, as subdued inflation gives policymakers time to assess the economic fallout from US tariffs this year and next.】

item.title: 汇丰银行在财报发布前因房地产和利率忧虑而退却
item.description: 华尔街多头在汇丰控股有限公司公布业绩前转为谨慎，因为香港房地产下滑加剧了他们对地缘政治和经济风险的忧虑。【原文：Wall Street bulls are turning cautious on HSBC Holdings Plc. before its results, as Hong Kong’s deepening property downturn added to their angst over geopolitical and economic risks.】

item.title: 最后期限临近，韩国官员与卢特尼克举行关税谈判
item.description: 韩国官员周二在华盛顿会见了美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick），他们在最后一刻加紧努力，以防止在一个关键的最后期限前几天增加对韩国出口产品的全面关税。【原文：South Korean officials met with US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick in Washington on Tuesday, stepping up last-minute efforts to prevent an increase in sweeping tariffs on Korean exports just days before a key deadline.】

item.title: 特朗普加大对俄罗斯的停战压力，石油保持大幅上涨
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普重申除非与乌克兰达成停战协议，否则他可能会对俄罗斯实施额外的经济惩罚之后，石油保持了六周以来的最大涨幅。【原文：Oil held the biggest gain in six weeks after US President Donald Trump reiterated he may impose additional economic penalties on Russia unless a truce is reached with Ukraine.】

item.title: 特朗普的贸易协议细节不多，但数字很大
item.description: 到目前为止，唐纳德-特朗普总统宣布的一系列贸易协议都缺乏细节；关键方面仍在谈判中，合作伙伴对他们签署的协议给出的信号不一，大数字也在审查中缩水。【原文：President Donald Trump’s flurry of trade deal announcements are so far proving light on detail — with key aspects still under negotiation, partners giving mixed signals about what they signed up for, and big numbers shrinking under scrutiny.】

item.title: 澳大利亚青少年社交媒体禁令将包括 YouTube
item.description: YouTube将被纳入澳大利亚针对16岁以下儿童的社交媒体禁令，这是澳大利亚官方在谷歌旗下的视频网站最初被排除在立法之外后做出的改变。【原文：YouTube will be included in Australia’s social media ban for children under 16 years of age, an about-face by officials after the Google-owned video site had initially been left out of the legislation.】

item.title: 邦迪称加州大学洛杉矶分校将为校园反犹太主义付出 "沉重代价
item.description: 在司法部认定加州大学洛杉矶分校未能制止校园内的反犹太主义骚扰行为，从而违反了联邦民权法之后，总检察长帕姆-邦迪（Pam Bondi）周二要求该校 "严厉问责"。【原文：Attorney General Pam Bondi demanded “severe accountability” from the University of California at Los Angeles on Tuesday after the Justice Department found the university violated federal civil rights laws by failing to stop antisemitic harassment on campus.】

item.title: 墨西哥提高对从 Shein、Temu 网购的进口税
item.description: 随着避免美国关税的谈判进入最后阶段，墨西哥正在提高对中国零售商申银万国和特姆等公司小额网购商品的进口税。【原文：Mexico is raising import taxes on small online purchases from companies such as Chinese retailers Shein Group Ltd. and Temu as negotiations to avoid US tariffs go down to the wire.】

item.title: 富豪为继承人制定计划，高盛为亚洲地区提供艺术顾问服务
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is building up its art advisory services in Asia, as wealthy families catch up with those in the US and Europe on collections.】
